definition: first month of the lunar year
straight/upright/proper/main/principal/to correct/to rectify/exactly/just (at that time)/right (in that place)/(math.) positive
to bear/to carry (on one's back)/to turn one's back on/to be defeated/negative (math. etc)

sentences.english: The telephone poll's margin of error is plus or minus 4%.
sentences.chinese: 此次電話民調的誤差幅度約爲正負4%。

sentences.english: Shifts the bits of an expression to the right, maintaining sign.
sentences.chinese: 將運算式的位元向右移，保留正負號。

sentences.english: It's really a simple numbers game with negative and positive numbers.
sentences.chinese: 它其實就是正負數的簡單數字遊戲。

sentences.english: Most managers attempt to influence employee motivation using both positive and negative approaches.
sentences.chinese: 大多數經理試圖正負雙法並舉，激發員工的積極性。

sentences.english: The ions in TATB are with positive and negative charges in turns.
sentences.chinese: 整個TATB分子上面離子的淨電荷是正負相間的。

sentences.english: The engineering of the electron-positron collider that we have completed also ranks among the world's most advanced technologies.
sentences.chinese: 我們的正負電子對撞機工程在全世界也是居於前列的。

sentences.english: During choose the direct current power supply, pay attention to the negative and positive.
sentences.chinese: 選用直流供電時，注意正負極標識。

sentences.english: The margin of error was plus or minus 3 percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 誤差區間爲正負3個百分點。

sentences.english: Please notice the place of anode and cathode when pit in the batteries.
sentences.chinese: 安裝電池時請注意放好正負極位置。

sentences.english: The exponent is interpreted as a signed integer, allowing negative as well as positive exponents.
sentences.chinese: 作爲有符號整數的指數可以有正負之分。

sentences.english: Is the thermocouple positive and negative poles are consistent.
sentences.chinese: 是熱電偶的正負極是否一致。

sentences.english: Finally, a set of axioms is co…
sentences.chinese: 最後給出了正負域運算的公理化定義。

sentences.english: The margin of sampling error was plus or minus 3 percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 抽樣錯誤的差額是正負3%。

sentences.english: Must connect the laser tube correctly positively and negatively extremely.
sentences.chinese: 要正確連接激光管的正負極。

sentences.english: Do not directly touch terminal by hand.
sentences.chinese: 不要直接用手接觸電容器正負極。

sentences.english: The poll's margin of error was plus or minus two percentage points.
sentences.chinese: 該調查的誤差率爲正負2%。
